🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":662564,"totalDownVotes":49731,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":73116,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":556103,"totalDownVotes":39231,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[UPDATE!] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":46632,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

Collect them all!

🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3855300,"totalDownVotes":318237,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":73199,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":5449496,"creatorName":"Lyte Interactive","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":501303,"totalDownVotes":47852,"universeId":2404080894,"name":"[VS TREE] Funky Friday","placeId":6447798030,"playerCount":40406,"imageToken":"T_6447798030_4d91","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"beat box battle

Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

➢ youtube.com/channel/UCwxB9DjiJKOcZbDPIvsCZBg?sub_confirmation=1

Disclaimers:
➢ You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2100966,"totalDownVotes":290458,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":41290,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌼New Update 5/3! Check the in-game update log in new servers (the book with the !) for full details!

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":166430,"totalDownVotes":8675,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[🤝UPDATE 3.5] Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":16503,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure experience. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4393759,"totalDownVotes":594875,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":27836,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Coming up next: An epic new robbery!

🔥 PIT MANEUVERS!

🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2196619,"totalDownVotes":672749,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":53722,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

Sorry for anyone unable to use Shift-Lock due to Roblox binding chat to Shift+7 on some keyboards. This is a Roblox issue we are unable to fix"},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1461631,"totalDownVotes":121782,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":32546,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

--- +4 Barrels Of TNT!
--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1039393,"totalDownVotes":52531,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":19641,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Builder: @BIack_Smith
Modeler: @Mirror_RBX"},{"creatorId":1235888,"creatorName":"The MLG Gang","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":110386,"totalDownVotes":7479,"universeId":2492481398,"name":"Noob Army Tycoon","placeId":6610021055,"playerCount":39059,"imageToken":"T_6610021055_7d68","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Attack the other noobs in this epic tycoon."},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":286597,"totalDownVotes":149032,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":23804,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":547411,"totalDownVotes":43295,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":18576,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"In this world, no one can survive alone. Team up with friends to fend off countless waves of zombies, fight bosses, earn coins, level up, and buy new towers! If you're feeling up for a challenge, try taking on harder bosses on harder difficulties!

👥💵 Join the group for +$100 starting cash! https://www.roblox.com/groups/4914494

🏆 8th Annual Bloxy Award Winner
Google "TDS Wiki" for in-depth game info!"},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2358505,"totalDownVotes":248155,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] BOOK UPDATE!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":43769,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":717339,"totalDownVotes":96001,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 💧 [WATER & BANNERS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":18350,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Islands!

spleenhook (https://twitter.com/spleenhook)

🥁Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":7944567,"creatorName":"Awakened: Productions","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":6744,"totalDownVotes":1314,"universeId":2050890865,"name":"[RELEASE + HUGE UPDATE] Stands Awakening [Beta]","placeId":5780309044,"playerCount":11709,"imageToken":"T_5780309044_827d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"JOIN THE GROUP:
https://www.roblox.com/groups/7944567/Awakened-Productions#!/about

NOTE: THIS IS ONLY THE BASE REVAMP, MORE CONTENT IS BEING ADDED IN THE FUTURE

Welcome to Stands Awakening, the rewritten version of A Bizarre Day Modded 

Stands Awakening functions like A Bizarre Day Modded but with a rewritten and improved upon source code which will help cut down on exploiters and bugs with some small yet good features like cooldown and damage indicators Currently, Stands Awakening is in its Beta stage, and is nowhere near a complete state, new content and Stand reworks will be added as time goes on.

waht the j"},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":249760,"totalDownVotes":22127,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[ DRAGON 🐉 ] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":19124,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

- Fruits spawn in the map every 30 Minutes / Despawn 15 Minutes.
- First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1204968,"totalDownVotes":68497,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":13862,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1812434,"totalDownVotes":141762,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":7352,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
New skins added to Creator Case and Meme 2 Case
Crane Site Revamp re-added to regular map pool

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":196870,"totalDownVotes":32226,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ BLEACH ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":8131,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Check the second page of the roster to see JoJo characters.
 
Controls:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Block
Basic Attack: Mouse1
Space+Mouse1: Aerial Attack
Combine Basic Attacks and Aerial Attacks to discover new combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 for your character special moves.
Transformation: G

Developers:  Melon_Sensei, Chicken_Man, Snakeworl
Contributors: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA, Nilvaat, jjjakey, Kogrin, rikaid, Estheking"},{"creatorId":8098236,"creatorName":"Nighty Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":34459,"totalDownVotes":6818,"universeId":2435789930,"name":"Twilight Daycare 🍼 [Baby Carrier!]","placeId":6507422231,"playerCount":36047,"imageToken":"T_6507422231_7510","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"[Second Floor is now opened! ✨ Thank you so much for 50M+ visits! 🙌]

⭐ Explore the new second floor!
🧢 Baby carriers and more baby bottles has been added!
✨ Unlock new perks with stars!
👍 Favorite and like for future updates!
✅ Join group for "Supporter" exclusive name tag - https://www.roblox.com/groups/8098236

New updates are now available from new server! ✨ Experience Points will be earned by both babies and caretakers after completing activities and XP Points will be used for unlocking perks ✔️

Welcome to Twilight Daycare! 🍼 Take up the role as a caretaker 👨👩 to take care of babies or become a baby 👶 in the daycare to enjoy the love and fun. 💕 More roles, toys, activities are coming in future! ✨

Thank you very much, KonekoKitten 🙌
